wikipedia_page.main: Robert Ferguson (born April quarter 1908, date of death unknown) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. He played a single match in the Football League for Nelson. His brother, Ted, also played football for Nelson and Ashington.

Robert Ferguson was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward.
